description: When I was in vocational high school I did an internship program, I did an internship at PT. IKSA MEDIA which is a branding company. During my internship I was in the position of SEO Writer

When I was in college and entered semester 5, all students had to take part in a mandatory internship as a graduation requirement. I did an internship at PT. KAI which is engaged in the field of train transportation. During my internship I learned a lot about the railway work system. My activities during the internship were carrying out maintenance and repair of signals and telecommunications.

besides studying I also do part time work, I work as a private teacher at the enthusiastic tutoring center in Semarang for approximately 2 semesters. I teach all elementary and junior high school subjects

besides being a student, i also work as a part time employee at domino's pizza until now. as a part time i feel i can divide my time between lectures and work well. here i get a lot of experience and know how the real working world is
